verses.verse: Then I <S%H7200>looked<s%>, and <S%H7549>behold<s%>, in the firmament that was over the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> there <S%H7200>appeared<s%> above them as it were a <S%H5601>sapphire<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%>, as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of a <S%H3678>throne<s%>.

And he <S%H559>spake<s%> unto the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Go <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the whirling <S%H1534>wheels<s%>, even under the <S%H3742>cherub<s%>, and <S%H4390>fill<s%> both thy <S%H2651>hands<s%> with <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> from <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%>, and <S%H2236>scatter<s%> them over the <S%H5892>city<s%>. And he went <S%H935>in<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight<s%>.

Now the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> on the right <S%H3225>side<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, when the <S%H376>man<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%>; and the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>.

And the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> mounted <S%H7311>up<s%> from the <S%H3742>cherub<s%>, and stood over the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>; and the <S%H1004>house<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with the <S%H6051>cloud<s%>, and the <S%H2691>court<s%> was <S%H4390>full<s%> of the <S%H5051>brightness<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H3519>glory<s%>.

And the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> was <S%H8085>heard<s%> even to the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>, as the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> when he <S%H1696>speaketh<s%>.

And it came to <S%H6680>pass<s%>, when he commanded the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> from between the whirling <S%H1534>wheels<s%>, from between the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%>, that he went <S%H935>in<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> a <S%H212>wheel<s%>.

And the <S%H3742>cherub<s%> stretched <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from between the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> unto the <S%H784>fire<s%> that was between the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%>, and <S%H5375>took<s%> <S%H5414>thereof<s%>, and put it into the <S%H2651>hands<s%> of him that was <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen<s%>, who <S%H3947>took<s%> it and went <S%H3318>out<s%>.
And there <S%H7200>appeared<s%> in the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> the <S%H8403>form<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%> under their <S%H3671>wings<s%>.

And I <S%H7200>looked<s%>, and <S%H702>behold<s%>, four <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H212>wheel<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%>, and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H212>wheel<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%>; and the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H212>wheels<s%> was <S%H5869>like<s%> unto a <S%H8658>beryl<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%>.
And as for their <S%H4758>appearance<s%>, they <S%H702>four<s%> had <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1823>likeness<s%>, as if a <S%H212>wheel<s%> had been <S%H8432>within<s%> a <S%H212>wheel<s%>.

When they <S%H3212>went<s%>, they <S%H3212>went<s%> in their <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7253>directions<s%>: they <S%H5437>turned<s%> not as they <S%H3212>went<s%>, but to the <S%H4725>place<s%> whither the <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H6437>looked<s%> they <S%H3212>followed<s%> <S%H5437>it<s%>; they turned not as they <S%H3212>went<s%>.

And their whole <S%H1320>body<s%>, and their <S%H1354>backs<s%>, and their <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and their <S%H3671>wings<s%>, and the <S%H212>wheels<s%>, were <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5869>eyes<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, even the <S%H212>wheels<s%> that they four <S%H702>had<s%>.
As for the <S%H212>wheels<s%>, they were <S%H7121>called<s%> in my <S%H241>hearing<s%>, the whirling <S%H1534>wheels<s%>.

And every <S%H259>one<s%> had <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6440>faces<s%>: the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> was the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherub<s%>, and the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> was the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%>, and the <S%H7992>third<s%> face the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H738>lion<s%>, and the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of an <S%H5404>eagle<s%>.
And the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> mounted <S%H7426>up<s%>: this is the living <S%H2416>creature<s%> that I <S%H7200>saw<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3529>Chebar<s%>.

And when the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%>, the <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> beside <S%H681>them<s%>; and when the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H3671>wings<s%> to mount <S%H7311>up<s%> from the <S%H776>earth<s%>, the <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H1992>also<s%> <S%H5437>turned<s%> not from beside <S%H681>them<s%>.

When they <S%H5975>stood<s%>, these <S%H5975>stood<s%>; and when they mounted <S%H7311>up<s%>, these mounted <S%H7426>up<s%> with <S%H7307>them<s%>: for the spirit of the living creature was in <S%H2416>them<s%>.
And the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> from over the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> over the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%>.

And the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H3671>wings<s%>, and mounted <S%H7426>up<s%> from the <S%H776>earth<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight<s%> when they went <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and the <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H5980>beside<s%> <S%H5975>them<s%>: and they stood at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H6931>east<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>; and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was over them <S%H4605>above<s%>.

This is the living <S%H2416>creature<s%> that I <S%H7200>saw<s%> under the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3529>Chebar<s%>; and I <S%H3045>knew<s%> that they were <S%H3742>cherubim<s%>.

Every <S%H259>one<s%> had <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6440>faces<s%>, <S%H259><s%> and every <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3671>wings<s%>; and the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> was under their <S%H3671>wings<s%>.

And as for the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of their <S%H6440>faces<s%>, they were <S%H1992>the<s%> <S%H6440>faces<s%> which I <S%H7200>saw<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3529>Chebar<s%>, their <S%H4758>appearances<s%> and <S%H3212>themselves<s%>; they went every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5676>straight<s%> <S%H6440>forward<s%>.
